signals.gui
Class PlotThumbnailGraphic

java.lang.Object
  signals.gui.ThumbnailGraphic
      signals.gui.PlotThumbnailGraphic
Direct Known Subclasses:
Function1DThumbnailGraphic, FunctionTerm1DThumbnailGraphic
public abstract class PlotThumbnailGraphic
extends ThumbnailGraphic

A graphic for a simple plot with one data sequence. It can be painted in two sizes: small and large.

Author:
Juliet

creates graphics for the real an imaginary parts, x-axis, and y-axis of the function

Parameters:

height - height of the plot
